title: Knife, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade has straight upper edge, lower edge tapering towards the point. Blade is etched with floral pattern on front and back; plain bolster. Silver ferrule, round insection, decorated with floral pattern (stamped?). Carved ivory handle: a man in costume with hat, playing a bagpipe. Attached to his belt a dagger, in sheath a knife in sheath and a horn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. ivory, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-173.
